summary: Prior to the Iranian revolution it was a place where people of all religions were allowed to flourish. This is the story of a prosperous Jewish family who abandon everything before they are consumed by the passions of revolutionaries.
cast: Salma Hayek|Adrien Brody|Shohreh Aghdashloo|Gabriella Wright|Alon Aboutboul|Anthony Azizi|Nasser Memarzia|Ben Youcef|Jamie Ward|Bashar Rahal|Maggie Parto|Armin Amiri|Dimitar Ilkov|Liron Levo|Velislav Pavlov|Ariana Molkara|Asli Bayram|Boyko Krastanov|Alain Ali Washnevsky|Leart Dokle|Ivailo Dimitrov|Niki Stanchev|Navid Navid|Vlado Mihailov|George Zlatarev|Wadih Dona|Christina Mani|Ivaylo Grancharov
title: Septembers of Shiraz
